thread.title: BRIEF-Bulletproof Group Says ‍Klikon Group Holdings Pty To Acquire Bulletproof By Way Of A Scheme Of Arrangement​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bulletproof Group Says ‍Klikon Group Holdings Pty To Acquire Bulletproof By Way Of A Scheme Of Arrangement​

organizations.name: brief-bulletproof group says ‍klikon group holdings pty to acquire bulletproof

text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Bulletproof Group Ltd:
* ‍KLIKON GROUP HOLDINGS PTY TO ACQUIRE BULLETPROOF BY WAY OF A SCHEME OF ARRANGEMENT​
* BULLETPROOF SHAREHOLDERS ARE OFFERED CASH CONSIDERATION OF 15.2 CENTS PER SHARE UNDER AC3 OFFER ​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
